alert.note: Alert for Northern Arctic Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued June 04 at 12:31AM AKDT until June 04 at 12:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM EARLY THIS MORNING TO NOON AKDT TODAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility expected. Additional snow accumulations of one inch. Winds gusting to 40 mph. Visibility one half mile or less at times. * WHERE...Northern Arctic Coast. * WHEN...From 4 AM this morning to noon AKDT today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will increase and visibility will fall due to snow and blowing snow early this morning. Conditions are expected to improve by noon as winds decrease and visibility improves.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
